Definitions


Metric Description
Collaboration Hours The average time you spent with email and meetings each week.
Utilization The length of time between your first email or meeting and last email or meeting each day.
Collaboration Hours Outside 8-5 The average time you spent with email and meetings outside regular business hours each week.
Meeting Hours The average time you spent in meetings each week.
Mail Hours The average time you spent with email each week.
Organizational Load The time you cost the organization with email and meetings.
Push Hours The average time others spent on email and meetings you created each week.
Fragmentation The number of 2-hour blocks of time you had between meetings each day 8 am to 5 pm.
Double Booked Hours The average time you were scheduled in simultaneous meetings each week.
Low Engagement Hours The average time you spent in double booked or redundant meetings or sending more than two emails per hour in meetings each week.
External Meeting Hours The average time you spent with people outside of your organization.
Redundant Meeting Hours The average time you spent in redundant meetings.
Meetings Attended The average number of meetings you attend each week.
Time Spent in Meetings 30-59 min Duration The average number of 30 to 59 minute meetings you attend each week.
Received Mail The average number of emails you receive each week.
Sent Mail The average number of emails you send each week.
Attachments The average number of email attachments you send each week.
Management Interactions The average number of meetings you had with a person at least one level above you each week.
Skip Level Interactions The average number of meetings you had with a person at least two levels above you each week.
One-on-one Manager Interactions The average number of one-on-one meetings you attended each week.
One-on-one Manager Hours The average time you spent in one-on-one meetings each week.
Manager Centralization The percent of a team's meetings and emails in which the manager of the team was involved
Hours with Manager The average time you spent meeting with your direct manager
Manager Load Absorption The average ratio of time you spent in meetings compared to your managers.
Internal Network Size The number of connections you have within your company. A connection is made with at least two emails or meetings involving less than five people.
Internal Network Breadth The number of internal departments in which you have at least one connection.
External Network Size The number of connections you have outside your company. A connection is made with an email or meeting involving less than five people.
External Network Breadth The number of external domains in which you have at least one connection. A connection is made with at least two meetings or emails involving less than 5 people.
Function Depth The average number of connections within your job function.
Level Depth The average number of connections within your job level.
Region Depth The average number of connections within your geographic region.
Organizational Depth The average number of connections within your organization.
Network Velocity The average number of new connections per month.
Network Efficiency The average time spent collaborating with each internal connection per month
Insularity by Organization The percent of time you spent emailing and meeting within your organization, relative to your total time emailing and meeting
Insularity by Function The percent of time you spent emailing and meeting within your job function, , relative to your total time emailing and meeting.
Insularity by Region The percent of time you spent emailing and meeting within your geographic region, , relative to your total time emailing and meeting
Insularity by Level The percent of time you spent emailing and meeting within our organization level, , relative to your total time emailing and meeting
